name: twitterannotator
description: Twitter Annotator is an UI-Prototype for annotation tweets.

scripts.build: npm run lint & npm run jsdoc & npm run htmlMinify & npm run jsMinfy & npm run cssMinfy
scripts.jsMinfy: minify js/annotator.ui.js  -c --no-comments & minify js/annotator.io.js -c --no-comments & minify js/rainbow-tweet.js -c --no-comments
